transcripts.text: This is Bob Mueller.  He was the special counsel investigating Russian interference into the 2016 elections.  He concluded that President Trump may have obstructed the investigation, but he couldn't bring charges because it's Congress's responsibility to hold the president accountable.  Now, Congress wants Mueller to testify about President Trump's obstruction, but the president is against it.  Congress and the American people.  Gotta know whether or not their president's a crook.  Call your representative and tell them, Mueller must testify before Congress.
